text:
Здравейте,

 

Наши партньори молят да издадем приложената фактура в евро. Възможно ли е?

 

С най-добри пожелания,                                                   

Елена Ковачки

Администрация и Бек Офис                                             

Моб: +359 893 659 834                                                                                                                                                

www.tibiel.com <http://www.tibiel.com/>      

ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД    



                                                              

 

From: Yulia Maslova <ym@ozbor.cy> 
Sent: Tuesday, January 28, 2025 9:43 PM
To: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>
Cc: Yulia Goncharenko <yg@ozbor.cy>; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com>
Subject: Re: : New Trade Executed (ID: 169654)_Tibiel > Ozbor_regarding overpayment from August BGH deal

 

Dear Elena

 

Please send us the attached invoice for the deal ID: 169654 but in EUR please

 

Our accountants need it

 

Thank you

 

Kind regards

Yulia

 

From: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com> >
Date: Wednesday, 13 November 2024 at 3:37 PM
To: Yulia Maslova <ym@ozbor.cy <mailto:ym@ozbor.cy> >
Cc: Yulia Goncharenko <yg@ozbor.cy <mailto:yg@ozbor.cy> >, Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com <mailto:a.ivanova@tibiel.com> >
Subject: RE: : New Trade Executed (ID: 169654)_Tibiel > Ozbor_regarding overpayment from August BGH deal

 

Dear Yulia,

 

Regarding the issue with invoice 3100000518, On behalf of Tibiel, I am confirming the payment in EUR instead of BGN.

 

Therefore, the invoice 3100000595 with the amount of 3775 BGN for deal 169654, has been deducted.

 

You have overpaid 6069,5 BGN

You have left 2294 BGN in debit, which will be under deduction to the next invoice.

 

I spoke with our accountants, and they are changing the currency in your account to EUR.

 

Please, accept our apologies for the inconvenience situation.

 

Kind regards,

Elena Kovachki  

Administration & Back office

Mob: +359 893 659 834                                                                                                                                                                                                     

www.tibiel.com/en <http://www.tibiel.com/en>                                                                        

TIBIEL EOOD



 

 

From: Yulia Maslova <ym@ozbor.cy <mailto:ym@ozbor.cy> > 
Sent: Wednesday, November 13, 2024 1:10 PM
To: Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com <mailto:a.ivanova@tibiel.com> >
Cc: Office <office@tibiel.com <mailto:office@tibiel.com> >; Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com> >; Trade <Trade@tibiel.com <mailto:Trade@tibiel.com> >; Yulia Goncharenko <yg@ozbor.cy <mailto:yg@ozbor.cy> >
Subject: FW: : New Trade Executed (ID: 169654)_Tibiel > Ozbor_regarding overpayment from August BGH deal
Importance: High

 

Dear Aneta, good afternoon!

I hope my e-mail finds you well!

 

We would like to pay your attention to the fact that on 13th August, 2024 we paid the amount of 6’350.00 EUR instead of 6’350.00 BGN under your invoice 3100000518.

 

Your invoice and our bank statement are attached

 

We kindly ask you to confirm it. 

 

Then the balance in our favor should be 6350.00 EUR – 3’246.70 EUR = 3’103.30 EUR

 

If you agree then we kindly ask you to deduct the amount of the new deal (ID: 169654) at the Balkan Gas Hub platform from our remaining balance

 

Which means that actual balance in our favor should be: 3’103.30 EUR – 1’930.13 EUR = 1’183.17 EUR

 

Please kindly confirm or comment

 

Furthermore we kindly ask you to issue your invoices also in EUR in future as we are not Bulgarian company

 

Thank you and looking forward to your reply!

 

 

Kind regards,

Yulia Maslova

__________________________________

OZBOR ENTERPRISES LIMITED

E-mail: ym@ozbor.cy <mailto:ym@ozbor.cy>  
Tel: +41 79 826 34 54

 



     Anthoupoleos, 28, Lakatamia,

     Nicosia, 2301, Cyprus

 

 

 

 

From: Balkan Gas Hub <noreply@balkangashub.bg <mailto:noreply@balkangashub.bg> >
Date: Monday, 11 November 2024 at 11:53 AM
To: ozbor operations <operations@ozbor.cy <mailto:operations@ozbor.cy> >
Cc: "trades@balkangashub.bg <mailto:trades@balkangashub.bg> " <trades@balkangashub.bg <mailto:trades@balkangashub.bg> >
Subject: BGH:: New Trade Executed (ID: 169654)

 


Trade Notification


OZBOR ENTERPRISES LIMITED [Aggressor Company] bought 50 MWh/day at VTP Bulgaria WD at 75.50 BGN from TIBIEL LTD [Initiator Company] 

 

________________________________

This email may contain confidential and/or legally privileged information. It is intended exclusively for the addressee(s). As our company operates in accordance with the requirements of GDPR we perceive any disclosure, copying, distribution or any other action with this information as strictly prohibited. In case this message has been sent to you by mistake, please inform us so we can ensure this does not occur anymore and then delete the message and the attachments there to from your system. In case of any inquiries related to GDPR compliance or data protection, please contact our Data Protection Officer at the following email address: admin@balkangashub.bg <mailto:admin@balkangashub.bg> . Thank you for your cooperation!” 

Този имейл може да съдържа поверителна и/или юридически привилегирована информация. Тя е предназначена изключително за адресата/ите. Тъй като нашето Дружество осъществява дейността си в съответствие с изискванията на GDPR възприемаме всяко разкриване, копиране, разпространение и всяко друго действие с тази информация, като строго забранено. В случай, че това съобщение е изпратено до Вас по грешка, моля уведомете ни, за да гарантираме, че това няма да се случва повече и след това изтрийте съобщението и прикачената информация от вашата система. За всякакви запитвания, свързани със спазването на изискванията на GDPR или защитата на данните, винаги можете да се свържете с нашето длъжностно лице по защита на данните на следния имейл адрес: admin@balkangashub.bg <mailto:admin@balkangashub.bg> . Благодаря Ви за съдействието!"
